title: Development environment
content:
Development environment (Windows 11) # MSYS2 # install MSYS2 # Q: stuck on 66% in the first installation
S: kill the process re-install
packages # pacman -S git zsh vim # ~/.zshrc alias vi='vim' # complete hard drives in msys2 drives=$(mount | sed -rn 's#^[A-Z]: on /([a-z]).*#\1#p' | tr '\n' ' ') zstyle ':completion:*' fake-files /: "/:$drives" unset drives MSYS2 respond slowly # local user
$ mkpasswd -l -c > /etc/passwd$ mkgroup -l -c > /etc/group disable db in /etc/nsswitch.conf
# Begin /etc/nsswitch.confpasswd: files # dbgroup: files # dbdb_enum: cache builtindb_home: cygwin descdb_shell: cygwin descdb_gecos: cygwin desc# End /etc/nsswitch.conf Archived # install git # install zsh # zsh package: https://packages.msys2.org/package/zsh?repo=msys&variant=x86_64
peazip: https://peazip.github.io/
unzip to Git program directory(C:\Program Files\Git)
configure zsh as default shell
# ~/.bashrc if [ -t 1 ]; then exec zsh fi install oh-my-zsh # sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)" configure theme
vi ~/.zshrc Ref # https://dominikrys.com/posts/zsh-in-git-bash-on-windows/#installing-zsh-in-git-bash

title: Generate website with Hugo
content:
Generate website with Hugo # prepare Hugo # https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases
create repo and add theme # hugo new site my-blog # version control for original blog content git init # add theme repo as submodule git add submodule https://github.com/alex-shpak/hugo-book themes/hugo-book configuration # baseURL = 'https://<your-github-username>.github.io' languageCode = 'en-us' title = 'my-blog' theme = 'hugo-book' [params] # (Optional, default light) Sets color theme: light, dark or auto. # Theme 'auto' switches between dark and light modes based on browser/os preferences BookTheme = 'light' # (Optional, default true) Controls table of contents visibility on right side of pages. # Start and end levels can be controlled with markup.tableOfContents setting. # You can also specify this parameter per page in front matter. BookToC = true generate static site code # # for local debug hugo server # generate static website code hugo # version control for website code cd public/ git init deploy in Github Pages # push static code to Github
